definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: RDQ is a useful tool in the assessment of proximal esophageal acid reflux.
sentences.chinese: RDQ在评估近端食管酸反流有一定临床意义。

sentences.english: Endoscopic examination is indicated in cases of reflux esophagitis or other complications.
sentences.chinese: 有反流性食管炎或其他并发症时应行内镜检查。

sentences.english: Objective To search the surgical methods of esophageal carcinoma complicated with cicatricial pyloric obstruction .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨食管癌合并瘢痕性幽门梗阻的手术方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study clinicopathological characteristics of primary esophageal small cell carcinoma(PESC).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨食管小细胞癌的临床病理特点。

sentences.english: Prolonged exposure to refluxed acid leads to oesophagitis (inflammation of the oesophagus).
sentences.chinese: 长期酸液的反流会导致食管炎。

sentences.english: Objective To delve an effective method to prevent anastomotic leakage and stenosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨预防食管胃吻合口瘘和吻合口狭窄的方法。

sentences.english: Oesophagitis is inflammation of the inner lining of the oesophagus caused by repeated episodes of gastro-oesophageal reflux.
sentences.chinese: 胃食管反复逆流致使食道内部上火，从而导致食管炎。

sentences.english: Oesophagitis is inflammation of the inner lining of the oesophagus caused by repeated episodes of gastro-oesophageal reflux.
sentences.chinese: 胃食管反复逆流致使食道内部上火，从而导致食管炎。

sentences.english: The upper third of the esophagus is marked by skeletal muscle.
sentences.chinese: 食管上段有明显的骨骼肌。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic efficacy of qi-descending and phlegm-resolving therapy for non-erosive gastroesophageal reflux disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察降气化痰法治疗非糜烂性食管病的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Tan-yellow plaques are seen in the lower esophagus, along with mucosal hyperemia.
sentences.chinese: 食管下段可见黄褐色的斑块，同时黏膜充血。

sentences.english: In esophagitis of 10 countercurrent sex, 7 see balloon appearance cell.
sentences.chinese: 在10例反流性食管炎中，7例见到气球样细胞。

sentences.english: Hiatal hernia associated with reflux esophagitis.
sentences.chinese: 裂孔疝与返流性食管炎。

sentences.english: I also had GERD [gastroesophageal reflux disease], so I was hoarse all the time.
sentences.chinese: 我还有胃食管反流病，所以我的声音一直都很沙哑。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of a modified anastomotic technique on preventing anastomotic leakage and stricture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨防止食管癌术后吻合口瘘及狭窄的吻合术式。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate and sum up the post-operative patients with esophageal cancer care.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨和总结食管癌患者手术后的护理。

definition: esophagus/the proper way to eat/food transportation route
